project_subtitle: Full-featured laboratory logistics and invoice management system
project_description: Shwe Min Lab Admin Dashboard is a comprehensive platform designed to manage clinics, runners, lab test workflows, invoice generation, pricing plans, and role-based permissions. The system aims to digitize and streamline the medical lab logistics process by enabling a scalable and modular admin experience.

project_features.feature_description: CRUD functionality for clinics and runners, with pricing plan assignment to specific clinics.
Manage lab test collection from clinics, assign to runners, confirm reception, and track delivery for invoicing.
Admin can customize PDF-ready invoice headers and footers for document consistency.
Supports Excel export of current pricing and bulk import of updated plans for system-wide changes.
Assign specific tube types and required quantities per lab test for accurate logistics tracking.
Create and manage text sliders, fullscreen ads, and banner ads for system announcements or external promotions.
Create user roles, assign granular permissions, and control access to admin modules and data.

frontend.libraries: Shadcn UI, Vue Router, Firebase Auth, Pinia

mobile_api.scope: Full mobile integration for clinics and runners

project_goals.goal_description: Provide a centralized interface to manage all clinical operations, test routing, and invoicing.
Ensure accurate and timely test collection, delivery, and confirmation through a digital workflow.
Implement role-based access control for multiple departments and admin tiers.
Support rapid updates to lab pricing using import/export workflows integrated with Excel.

project_flowchart.mermaid_code:
flowchart TB
  A[Sidebar Menu] --> B[User Settings]
  A --> C[Clinic / Runner]
  A --> D[Ads / Pricing Plan]
  A --> E[Invoice Header & Footer]
  A --> F[Invoice List]
  A --> G[Lab Management]
  A --> H[Pickup Checking]
  A --> I[Labtest Rule]
  A --> J[Admin Profile]
  A --> K[Permissions Management]
  C --> C1[CRUD Clinics]
  C --> C2[CRUD Runners]
  C --> C3[Assign Pricing Plan to Clinics]
  D --> D1[Text Slider Ad]
  D --> D2[Fullscreen Ad]
  D --> D3[Banner Ad]
  D --> D4[Export Pricing to Excel]
  D --> D5[Import Updated Pricing]
  E --> E1[Create PDF Invoice Header/Footer]
  F --> F1[View Generated Invoices]
  G --> G1[Receive Lab Test]
  G1 --> G2[Deliver to Runner]
  G2 --> G3[Confirm Test Received]
  G3 --> G4[Generate Invoice & Result]
  G4 --> F1
  I --> I1[Assign Tubes to Tests]
  I --> I2[Set Tube Quantity]
  J --> J1[Edit Profile]
  K --> K1[Create Roles]
  K1 --> K2[Assign Permissions]
project_flowchart.description: Structured user and admin journey through modules like clinic management, lab operations, invoicing, and role control.
